description: Staircase of coefficients of polynomials used for column g.f.s of triangle A060923.
comments: a(n,m) is coefficient of x^m of polynomial pLe(n,x) := (((1+x)+(3-2*x)*sqrt(x))^n + ((1+x)-(3-2*x)*sqrt(x))^n)/2 of degree n+floor(n/2)= A032766(n). pLe(n,x)= sum(binomial(n,2*j)*(1+x)^(n-2*j)*(3-2*x)^(2*j)*x^j,j=0..floor(n/2)), n >= 1; pLe(0,x)=1.pLe(m+1,x) is the numerator polynomial of the g.f. for column m >= 0 of the triangle A060923 (even part of bisection of Lucas triangle).
formula: a(n, m)=sum(((-9/2)^j*binomial(n, 2*j)*sum((-3/2)^(k-m)*binomial(n-2*j, k)*binomial(2*j, m-k-j), k=max(0, (m-3*j))..(n-2*j))), j=0..floor(n/2)), 0<= m <= n+floor(n/2); else 0.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
